Random seed: Platform dependent<ref name=nssplatformdep>For Unix/Linux it uses /dev/urandom if available  for Windows it uses CAPI. For other platforms it gets data from clock  and tries to open system files. NSS has a set of platform dependent functions it uses to determine randomness.</ref>
